entry.title: c-lightning discord community
entry.summary: C-lightning, a lightning network implementation for Bitcoin, has recently launched a discord server which can be used for asking general questions, developer conversations, and community support. The invite link to the server is https://discord.gg/WW56GGHavu. However, the platform still remains available on Telegram through the link https://t.me/lightningd and on IRC at #c-lightning on the libera.chat node.
